ModMetaData.name: Everytime a door opens you hear Atago saying Ara Ara
ModMetaData.author: yeru
ModMetaData.description:
Treat you and your colonists by replacing your doors with the best boat girl in Azur Lane saying Ara Ara.
- Sounds from vanilla doors are replaced by 12 voice lines from Atago (Azur Lane) saying Ara Ara - Vanilla doors can still be placed after completing research with a research table - Can be added and removed from existing saves
